<small>Also see: **<big>[[H4754|מָרָא]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרָה‎</span> **verb** ==be contentious, refractory, rebellious== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Hiph\`il; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> III. ***dispute with***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el ***contend with***); — 

**Qal.** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרָה‎</span> [[1Kgs.13.26|1Kgs 13:26]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָֽרְתָה‎</span> [[Hos.14.1|Hos 14:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרָ֑תָה‎</span> [[Jer.4.17|Jer 4:17]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרִיתָ‎</span> [[1Kgs.13.21|1Kgs 13:21]] + 11 t. perfect; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרוֺ‎</span> [[Lam.1.20|Lam 1:20]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרֶה‎</span> [[2Kgs.14.26|2Kgs 14:26]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מר‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרר‎</span>, [[BDB#Kmp|Kmp]]<sup>Kau</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּי מַר הוּא‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרֶה‎</span> [[Deut.21.18|Deut 21:18]] + 3 t.; feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרְאָה‎</span> [[Zeph.3.1|Zeph 3:1]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרָה‎</span>; metaplastic form according to [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75»§ 75</sup> R. 22); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרִים‎</span> [[Num.20.10|Num 20:10]] — ***be disobedient, rebellious:*** 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּן סוֺרֵר וּמֹרֶה‎</span> [[Deut.21.18|Deut 21:18]]; [[Deut.21.20|Deut 21:20]] ***stubborn and rebellious son*** (towards father). 

**2.** elsewhere towards God: <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֹּר סוֺרֵר וּמֹרֶה‎</span> [[Ps.78.8|Ps 78:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב סורר ומ‎</span> [[Jer.5.23|Jer 5:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺרְאָה ונגאלה הָעִיר‎</span> [[Zeph.3.1|Zeph 3:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמֹּרִים‎</span> [[Num.20.10|Num 20:10]] ***ye rebels*** ([[BDB#P|P]]); absolute [[Isa.50.5|Isa 50:5]]; [[Isa.63.10|Isa 63:10]]; [[Lam.1.20|Lam 1:20]] (twice in verse); \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מאן‎</span> [[Isa.1.20|Isa 1:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פשׁע‎</span> [[Lam.3.42|Lam 3:42]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person [[Hos.14.1|Hos 14:1]]; [[Ps.5.11|Ps 5:11]], elsewhere accusative of person [[Jer.4.17|Jer 4:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s words [[Ps.105.28|Ps 105:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרה (את) פי‎</span> [[Num.20.24|Num 20:24]]; [[Num.27.14|Num 27:14]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Sam.12.15|1Sam 12:15]]; [[1Kgs.13.21|1Kgs 13:21]]; [[1Kgs.13.26|1Kgs 13:26]] ([[BDB#D|D]]<sup>2</sup>) [[Lam.1.18|Lam 1:18]]. — In [[Hos.4.4|Hos 4:4]] read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרוּ בִי‎</span> ***have rebelled against me*** (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּמְרִיבֵי‎</span>), so [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Proph. iv. n. 8</sup> [[BDB#Che|Che]] (for other views see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ריב‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִמְרוּ‎</span> [[Ps.106.33|Ps 106:33]]; [[Ps.107.11|Ps 107:11]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַמְרֶה‎</span> [[Josh.1.18|Josh 1:18]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתֶּ֫מֶר‎</span> [[Ezek.5.6|Ezek 5:6]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמֵּר‎</span> (as if √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרר‎</span>) [[Exod.23.21|Exod 23:21]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֶּ֫מֶר‎</span> [[BDB#Di|Di]] and others; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַמְרוּ‎</span> [[Ps.106.43|Ps 106:43]] + 6 t; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַמְרוּהוּ‎</span> [[Ps.78.40|Ps 78:40]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּמְרוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.12.14|1Sam 12:14]] + 3 t.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַמְרוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.3.8|Isa 3:8]]; [[Ps.78.17|Ps 78:17]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּרוֺתָם‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:20»§ 20</sup>. 2b) [[Job.17.2|Job 17:2]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַמְרִים‎</span> [[Deut.9.7|Deut 9:7]] + 2 t.; — ***shew disobedience, rebelliousness***, always toward God: absolute [[Neh.9.26|Neh 9:26]]. (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרד‎</span>), [[Ps.106.7|Ps 106:7]]; [[Ps.106.43|Ps 106:43]]; [[Job.17.2|Job 17:2]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person [[Exod.23.21|Exod 23:21]]; [[Ezek.20.8|Ezek 20:8]]; [[Ezek.20.13|Ezek 20:13]]; [[Ezek.20.21|Ezek 20:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> [[Deut.9.7|Deut 9:7]]; [[Deut.9.24|Deut 9:24]]; [[Deut.31.27|Deut 31:27]] elsewhere accusative of God or his commands: [[Isa.3.8|Isa 3:8]]; [[Ezek.5.6|Ezek 5:6]]; [[Ps.78.17|Ps 78:17]]; [[Ps.78.40|Ps 78:40]]; [[Ps.78.56|Ps 78:56]]; [[Ps.107.11|Ps 107:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎המרה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎את פי‎</span> [[Deut.1.26|Deut 1:26]]; [[Deut.1.43|Deut 1:43]]; [[Deut.9.23|Deut 9:23]]; [[Josh.1.18|Josh 1:18]]; [[1Sam.12.14|1Sam 12:14]] ([[BDB#D|D]]<sup>2</sup>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אתרֿוחוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.106.33|Ps 106:33]] (compare [[BDB#Ephr.|Ephr]] 4:30); perhaps [[Ps.139.20|Ps 139:20]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָמַר‎</span> 

**1.**).
